title: "Study: Machine learning successfully tracks drugs stolen from hospitals faster and with minimal error"
excerpt: "A retrospective study published in American Journal of Health-System Pharmacy found that machine learning and advanced analytics technology not only identifies drug diversion - when drugs are stolen from hospitals - but also that the tech can do so 160 days faster than standard methods,"
